name: Degroof Petercam Asset Management
goal: Degroof Petercam asset Management, in short DPAM, a fund management company, manages funds and mandates on behalf of institutional end-investors as well as well as distribution partners such as private banks, insurance companies and retail networks. Based in the heart of Europe, it is an independent and Brussels-based company, wholly owned by the Degroof Petercam Group. It was created by the merger of Petercam Institutional Asset Management and Degroof Fund Management Company.
interests: Banking and financial services, Economy, finance and the euro, Taxation
